subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Jacksonville Jaguars have their third quarterbacks coach in less than a month, hiring Mike Sheppard from Cincinnati to replace Todd Monken, who became Oklahoma State’s offensive coordinator last week.
snippet: The Jacksonville Jaguars have their third quarterbacks coach in less than a month, hiring Mike Sheppard from Cincinnati to replace Todd Monken, who became Oklahoma State’s offensive coordinator last week.
